dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes inset map 'The famous and imperiall city of Moscow' with index, and views of 'Russche Narva', 'Archangel', 'The Emperours Court, 'A Hott House" and 'A Mill of Russia'. Verso contains "The description of Russia." Text pages numbered "53" and "54." From: A prospect of the most famous parts of the world. London : Printed for Thomas Basset ... and Richard Chiswell ... ,1676.
dct_publisher_sm: [London] : Sold by Tho. Basset in Fleetstreet and Richard Chiswell in St. Pauls Church yard, [1676]
dct_spatial_sm: Russia. Russian Empire. Soviet Union. Former Soviet Republics
